data.name: DONATE WITH CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD NOW
data.value: 立即用信用卡捐款

data.value: 捐款：

data.name: I would like to make a
data.value: 我想

data.name: OPEN ALIPAY APP AND DONATE NOW
data.value: 立即打开支付宝APP捐款

data.name: Or scan the QR code below with your Alipay app to donate now:
data.value: 或者用支付宝扫描下面的二维码：

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 尽可能多地帮助他们。

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 30 people.
data.value: 为30位朋友提供食物、洗澡和换衣物的机会。

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 10 people.
data.value: 为10位朋友提供食物、洗澡和换衣物的机会。

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 100 people.
data.value: 为100位朋友提供食物、洗澡和换衣物的机会。

data.name: monthly
data.value: 每月

data.name: one time
data.value: 一次

data.name: quarterly
data.value: 每季

data.name: yearly
data.value: 每年

data.name: Amount is required.
data.value: 金额是必需的。

data.name: (Please select a country)
data.value: （请选择一个国家）

data.name: Please enter your details below:
data.value: 请在下面输入您的详细信息

data.name: Submit Payment
data.value: 提交付款

data.name: The address at which you'd like to receive Renewal communications (optional, not related with card verification)
data.value: 您希望接收续订通讯的地址（可选，与卡验证无关）

data.name: Your card information
data.value: 您的卡信息

data.name: Your name as you'd like it to appear in our records (required)
data.value: 您希望显示在捐赠记录中的姓名（必填）

data.name: Donate
data.value: 捐款

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open in Safari' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在Safari打开”。

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open with Browser' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在浏览器打开”。

data.name: Please open this page in your browser.
data.value: 请在您的浏览器中打开此页面

data.name: Please enter a valid amount.
data.value: 请输入一个有效的金额。

data.name: Your generous gift is transformed into education, food, shelter, job training, and hope for homeless men and women.
data.value: 唯一能帮助我们提供这些服务的就是您慷慨的捐助。您会在今天帮我们提供热腾腾的饭菜、防水的大衣和清爽的洗澡服务吗？

data.name: to provide one month hot meals and care.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供一个月安全的住宿和温暖的帮助。

data.name: to provide one week of shelter and good meals.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供一周安全的住宿和健康的食物。

data.name: to provide three nights of shelter for a homeless man or woman.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供三个晚上安全的住宿。

data.name: Your gift today will change the life of a homeless person who struggling to survive on the streets and feels their hope running out.
data.value: 无家可归的人们在街头艰难地生活，甚至看不到希望。但您的捐赠有可能会改变他的一生。

data.name: will provide a meal, hot shower, and change of clothes for a homeless man or woman.
data.value: 就能为一位无家可归者提供一顿午餐、一次淋浴和一次换洗衣物的机会。

data.name: As the weather gets cooler, it's more important than ever to provide hot showers, clean warm clothes and hot nutritious meals to people who are struggling to survive on the streets. It is often your generosity in giving these small, affordable gifts that open the door to a someone who wants to get off the streets, find a good job, and start living an independent life.
data.value: 随着天气转凉，在街头艰难生存的无家可归者比以往更加需要热水淋浴、干净的衣服和热的午餐。您慷慨捐赠的这些普通的、并不昂贵的礼物可能会为他们打开一扇门，帮助他们找到合适的工作并开始独立的新生。

data.name: Every day of the year, it costs the Renewal Center
data.value: 每一年的每一天，日新中心都需要

data.name: of your gift will provide these life-changing essentials to a man or woman who is desperate just to put one foot forward, and off the streets.
data.value: ，就可能帮助一位绝望的无家可归者远离街头并开始新的人生。

data.name: to provide frontline services to homeless people -- like hot meals, showers and clean clothes. That means every
data.value: 元人民币的资金来为无家可归者提供前线服务，包括热的午餐、淋浴和干净的衣服。这意味着您每捐赠

data.name: With clean clothes and a hot meal, you can start a new life!
data.value: 得到了干净的衣服和健康的食物，你可以开始新的人生！

data.name: Your gift for meals and clean clothes inspires men to enter job training.
data.value: 您捐赠的午餐和衣服鼓舞着无家可归者参加工作培训
